Articles.Content:
Don't let the thumbnail fool you, this video has no commentary. Just filmed footage, music, and a few sounds.

After fatal accident of MOLAB rover, during Apollo style mission, Jeb and Bill were assumed dead, and lone pilot on the orbit returned to Kerbin. Crash happened in Grand Munar Canion, some 40 miles away from the lander. But are they really dead?

Enjoy:

Awesome! I loved the sequence where he contacted the space station.

ZodiaK. Gonna go gets me sum Kerb Cam!

Awesome! I loved the sequence where he contacted the space station.

ZodiaK. Gonna go gets me sum Kerb Cam!

Yep - Kerb Cam is an awesome tool. Still learning how to use it, but for purposes of such videos it's a must.
